title: Who can clearly explain keywords in a blog? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi ! I can recommend Neil Patel to you But Simply , keywords are those words that you use in indexing and finding your site. But certainly, it is not as simple as it seems. There is a peculiarity in finding the right keywords and using them on your website to improve your site's ranking. In fact, an entire industry is built around keywords and their usage. Experts spend many hours finding and applying useful keywords for their clients. For example, using common keywords on your site will help ensure that they are visible in search engine results rather than burying them under thousands of other results. There are keyword research tools that can help you find the exact keywords to use Keywords capture the essence of your site. Keywords are what your active visitor puts on a search engine to find websites related to a specific topic
